title: Advanced Vishing Attack Campaign “LetsCall” Targets Andriod Users
description:

In a newly detected muli-stage vishing campaign attackers are using an advanced toolset dubbed LetsCall, featuring strong evasion tactics.

title: Technician Indicted for Hacking California Water Treatment Facility
description:
By Deeba Ahmed
